noun.description: The direction towards the point of the horizon midway between south and west, or the point of the horizon itself.
The south-western part of a country, region, or town.
examples: the beach is in the south-west of the island

adjective.description: Lying towards, near, or facing the south-west.
examples: the south-west tower collapsed in a storm

adjective.description: Of or denoting the south-western part of a specified country, region, or town or its inhabitants.
